articles.title: Free N95 and surgical masks for each household starting Aug 26 - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Households here will each be given 50 medical-grade surgical masks and 25 N95 respirator masks, which they can collect at 131 supermarket outlets islandwide from Aug 26. This is the fifth distribution exercise of Temasek Foundation's Stay Prepared…
articles.content:

articles.title: Singapore PRs jailed for breaking Covid-19 laws to share food while on stay-home notice in hotel - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — After returning to Singapore from India on the same flight in March, Bojanki Suresh Naidu and Bharati Tulshiram Choudhari were placed on a stay-home notice on the same floor in Oasia Hotel Novena.

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Facebook initiates action against accounts, posts of Taliban - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: NEW DELHI: Facebook has initiated action against posts and accounts affiliated to Taliban, as the social media giant identifies the outfit as a terror.
articles.content: Facebook initiates action against accounts, posts of Taliban

articles.author: Alexander Wong
articles.title: Facebook and Google’s undersea cable to bypass Malaysia in Asia Pacific - Malay Mail
articles.description: While Malaysia hasn't settled the cabotage issue, Facebook and Google have announced Apricot, a 12,000km submarine cable that connects Japan, Taiwan, Guam, Indonesia, Singapore and the Philippines, but not Malaysia.
articles.content: Tech giants Facebook and Google have just announced Apricot, a new subsea cable that will boost connectivity in the Asia Pacific region. The 12,000km long submarine cable will connect Japan, Taiwan, … [+3623 chars]

articles.title: Turkey starts giving a fourth jab to travelers for vaccine passports - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Many countries won't recognize Sinovac, which was widely administered by Ankara
articles.content: ISTANBUL -- A fourth jab of vaccine? Would-be travelers in Turkey began receiving just that on Monday to become eligible for the vaccine passports necessary for them to journey to the U.S. and Europe… [+3382 chars]
